title: LF friends to climb with, im silver 4 support main
body:
Hey ma d00dz,

I need more friends to play ranked with so i can get out of silver.

I'm a support main and can play any champ as support tbh, but thresh is my best with 200k mastery score.

So yeah i need more d00dz to rank up with, im sick of playing solo queue and getting put with spuds.

Add me: Walsh

replies.body: Yo I'm keen will send you an add.

> [{quoted}](name=warewolf,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=FXjZQ66B,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-01T13:29:43.537+0000)
>
> where do you play?

Sorry for the late reply... i play adc and mid.
hey man would u be keen 2 play tonight
I'm keen maybe play some norms to get used to each other play styles but hell yeah
